sentences: Koloniaalv천imude ajast kolonelid olid k천rgeima t채hendusega.
Uurija lahkus siiani koloniaalse teadusse s천na kandmas.
Lugemisraha saabumisele juba ootamas olnud koloonia on rahulikult edasi liikunud.
context: The Estonian word 'kolonel' translates to English as 'colonel', and its related form 'kolloniaalne' refers to something associated with colonialism or colonies. It is commonly used in historical contexts, particularly when discussing military ranks (like a colonel) or the period of European colonization.
